languages.text: "Минуту твоего внимания, {name}". {n}Хейнрикс сохраняет обычное стоическое выражение лица, однако потемневшие глаза выдают его волнение.{/n} "Ни для меня, ни для других не секрет, что тебя связывают сложные отношения с членами твоей свиты. Я молчал, рассчитывая на то, что ты разрешишь это... противоречие, но всему приходит конец. Сделай милость — проясни наше положение".

"A minute of your time, {name}." {n}Heinrix's expression is stoic as usual, but there is disquiet in his darkened eyes.{/n} "It's no secret to me or the crew that your relationships with members of your closest circle are complicated. I said nothing, expecting you to resolve this... controversy, but everything has its limit. If you don't mind, I would like it if you clarified where you and I stand."
languages.original_text: "Минуту твоего внимания, {name}". {n}Хейнрикс сохраняет обычное стоическое выражение лица, однако потемневшие глаза выдают его волнение.{/n} "Ни для меня, ни для других не секрет, что тебя связывают сложные отношения с членами твоей свиты. Я молчал, рассчитывая на то, что ты разрешишь это... противоречие, но всему приходит конец. Сделай милость — проясни наше положение".

I said nothing, expecting you to resolve this... controversy, but everything has its limits. If you don't mind, I would like it if you clarified where you and I stand."

I said nothing, expecting you to resolve this... controversy, but everything has its limit. If you don't mind, I would like it if you clarified where you and I stand."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「少しの間でいいんだ、{name}さん」{n}ハインリックスは普段通り平然とした様子だが、彼の目には何か不穏なものがあった。{/n}「あなたとあなたの親しい友人たちの関係が複雑だと言うのは我も乗組員も皆知っている。だが、我は何も言わなかった。あなたがこの…論争を解決すると期待していたから。でも何事にも限界はある。もしよければ、我々の立ち位置は何なのかをはっきりしてくれると嬉しいんだが」
languages.original_text: "A minute of your time, {name}." {n}Heinrix's expression is stoic as usual, but there is disquiet in his darkened eyes.{/n} "It's no secret to me or the crew that your relationships with members of your closest circle are complicated. I said nothing, expecting you to resolve this... controversy, but everything has its limit. If you don't mind, I would like it if you clarified where you and I stand."

traits.locale_text: 「少しの間でいいんだ、{name}さん」{n}ハインリックスは普段通り平然とした様子だが、彼の目には何か不穏なものがあった。{/n}「あなたとあなたの親しい友人たちの関係が複雑だと言うのは我も乗組員も皆知っている。だが、我は何も言わなかった。あなたがこの…論争を解決すると期待していたから。でも何事にも限界はある。もしよければ、我々の立ち位置は何なのかをはっきりしてくれると嬉しいんだが」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我想占用你一点点时间，{name}。”{n}海因里希的表情与往常一样冷漠，但黝黑的双眼中却流露着不安。{/n}“无论是对我，还是对所有船员而言，你在最亲密的船员圈子之中的关系很复杂，这已经不是什么秘密了。在这之前，我对此并没有什么异议。我本希望你能自行解决……这些争议事项，但凡事都有限度。如果你不介意的话，我希望你能澄清一下我们之间的关系。”
languages.original_text: "A minute of your time, {name}." {n}Heinrix's expression is stoic as usual, but there is disquiet in his darkened eyes.{/n} "It's no secret to me or the crew that your relationships with members of your closest circle are complicated. I said nothing, expecting you to resolve this... controversy, but everything has its limit. If you don't mind, I would like it if you clarified where you and I stand."

traits.locale_text: “我想占用你一点点时间，{name}。”{n}海因里希的表情与往常一样冷漠，但黝黑的双眼中却流露着不安。{/n}“无论是对我，还是对所有船员而言，你在最亲密的船员圈子之中的关系很复杂，这已经不是什么秘密了。在这之前，我对此并没有什么异议。我本希望你能自行解决……这些争议事项，但凡事都有限度。如果你不介意的话，我希望你能澄清一下我们之间的关系。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Si vous voulez bien m'accorder un petit instant, {name}. » {n}L'expression d'Heinrix est aussi stoïque que d'habitude, mais son regard assombri trahit son trouble.{/n} « Ce n'est un secret ni pour moi ni pour l'équipage que vos relations avec certains membres de votre cercle rapproché sont compliquées. Je n'ai rien dit jusqu'à présent, car j'avais bon espoir que vous désamorciez cette... controverse, mais toute chose a une fin. Sauf votre respect, j'aimerais savoir où nous en sommes, vous et moi. »
languages.original_text: "A minute of your time, {name}." {n}Heinrix's expression is stoic as usual, but there is disquiet in his darkened eyes.{/n} "It's no secret to me or the crew that your relationships with members of your closest circle are complicated. I said nothing, expecting you to resolve this... controversy, but everything has its limit. If you don't mind, I would like it if you clarified where you and I stand."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous voulez bien m'accorder un petit instant, {name}. » {n}L'expression d'Heinrix est aussi stoïque que d'habitude, mais son regard assombri trahit son trouble.{/n} « Ce n'est un secret ni pour moi ni pour l'équipage que vos relations avec certains membres de votre cercle rapproché sont compliquées. Je n'ai rien dit jusqu'à présent, car j'avais bon espoir que vous désamorciez cette... controverse, mais toute chose a une fin. Sauf votre respect, j'aimerais savoir où nous en sommes, vous et moi. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Un minuto, {name}». {n}El rostro de Heinrix es tan estoico como de costumbre, pero sus ojos oscuros están inquietos.{/n} «No es ningún secreto, ni para mí ni para la tripulación, que las relaciones entre los miembros de su círculo interno son complicadas. No he dicho nada hasta ahora, esperando que resolviera la... polémica, pero las cosas tienen un límite. Si no le importa, le agradecería que aclarara nuestra posición».
languages.original_text: "A minute of your time, {name}." {n}Heinrix's expression is stoic as usual, but there is disquiet in his darkened eyes.{/n} "It's no secret to me or the crew that your relationships with members of your closest circle are complicated. I said nothing, expecting you to resolve this... controversy, but everything has its limit. If you don't mind, I would like it if you clarified where you and I stand."

traits.locale_text: «Un minuto, {name}». {n}El rostro de Heinrix es tan estoico como de costumbre, pero sus ojos oscuros están inquietos.{/n} «No es ningún secreto, ni para mí ni para la tripulación, que las relaciones entre los miembros de su círculo interno son complicadas. No he dicho nada hasta ahora, esperando que resolviera la... polémica, pero las cosas tienen un límite. Si no le importa, le agradecería que aclarara nuestra posición».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Eine Minute Eurer Zeit, {name}." {n}Heinrix' Miene ist stoisch wie immer, aber in seinem dunklen Blick liegt Besorgnis.{/n} "Es ist kein Geheimnis für mich oder die Crew, dass Eure Beziehungen zu den Mitgliedern Eures engsten Zirkels kompliziert sind. Ich habe nichts gesagt, in der Erwartung, Ihr würdet diese ... Kontroverse lösen, aber alles hat Grenzen. Falls Ihr nichts dagegen habt, würde ich Euch bitten, klarzustellen, wo Ihr und ich stehen."
languages.original_text: "A minute of your time, {name}." {n}Heinrix's expression is stoic as usual, but there is disquiet in his darkened eyes.{/n} "It's no secret to me or the crew that your relationships with members of your closest circle are complicated. I said nothing, expecting you to resolve this... controversy, but everything has its limit. If you don't mind, I would like it if you clarified where you and I stand."

traits.locale_text: "Eine Minute Eurer Zeit, {name}." {n}Heinrix' Miene ist stoisch wie immer, aber in seinem dunklen Blick liegt Besorgnis.{/n} "Es ist kein Geheimnis für mich oder die Crew, dass Eure Beziehungen zu den Mitgliedern Eures engsten Zirkels kompliziert sind. Ich habe nichts gesagt, in der Erwartung, Ihr würdet diese ... Kontroverse lösen, aber alles hat Grenzen. Falls Ihr nichts dagegen habt, würde ich Euch bitten, klarzustellen, wo Ihr und ich stehen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Bir dakikanı rica ediyorum {name}." {n}Heinrix'in ifadesi, her ne kadar her zamanki metanetli havasını korusa da sıkkın gözlerinden endişe okunuyor.{/n} "En yakın çevrendekilerle ilişkilerinin karmaşık olduğu, ne benim ne de mürettebatın için sır sayılır. Hiçbir şey söylemedim ve bu... Anlaşmazlığı çözmeni bekledim ama her şeyin bir sınırı var. Senin için sorun olmayacaksa aramızda ne olduğu hususunu açıklığa kavuşturmanı isterim."
languages.original_text: "A minute of your time, {name}." {n}Heinrix's expression is stoic as usual, but there is disquiet in his darkened eyes.{/n} "It's no secret to me or the crew that your relationships with members of your closest circle are complicated. I said nothing, expecting you to resolve this... controversy, but everything has its limit. If you don't mind, I would like it if you clarified where you and I stand."

Hiçbir şey söylemedim ve bu... Anlaşmazlığı çözmeni bekledim ama her şeyin bir sınırı var. Senin için sorun olmayacaksa aramızda ne olduğu hususunu açıklığa kavuşturmanı isterim."
